testCases.explanation: Group consecutive equal-value characters and return pairs [total_cost, max_cost] per group to indicate minimum deletion cost.
No consecutive equal characters; returns cost breakdown.
Three identical consecutive elements; minimum cost to leave one is sum - max = 3-1=2, returned as groups.

description: Given an array `nums` representing costs, group elements and return the minimum deletion costs for each group to make all characters equal within each group. Returns a 2D array of [group_total, group_max] pairs.
